divs: sighting detailsdecided to write this as it has been bothering me for a year now, on the 28th\29th of july 2012 at abpprox 1am - me, freinds & family members witnessed a ufo. coming home on the motorway, driving with 2 mates towards home on the a41 past kings langley we noticed 3 cars stopped on the motorway looking towards the cornfields, 4 people winessed lights moving high from the london directions was what they described as strobing balls of light almost translucent heading nw wards, i thought both cars were likely drunk or drugged up from olyimpic fever, a 4thd car stopped but the clouds were rolling so they all went after 10minutes. looking over the cornfields me & ben noticed faint strobe like effects high up, we esitmate they were below lowish cloud level in the bovingdon direction from the a41, we counted maybe 6 or 7 lights, we cn only descibe them as when you have a strobe light & shine it upwards almost like the batman sign. we thought maybe an party or rave or maybe a landing for a helicopter could be the answer but no light source seemed to coming from the ground. the air felt different - static - a heightened feel, ben puts this down to the humid night but i'm not that sure. my mates was getting a lift home to hatfield with thier girlfriends so i dropped them off in apsely & i drove home, ben called me & said he couldn't see them anymore goig home to hatfield, i got home at about 2.30am & noticed they visible from home, i woke my parents who witnessed these lights for till 3am approx at which time the clouds came in low & the sun started to brighter the horizons. i reported it to the police but had no follow up, ben also did but felt he wasn't taken seriously.on a side note my parents tried to film it, it never came out, even on nightshot, the lights were faint but visible to notice. the reason why i have'nt reported it here is because i did report it on another site which was no help, i also contacted several news sites, newspapers & local groups but didn't have 1 response back until last week when a guy phoned up asking about it for a article on ufos over herts, my mum didn't like the sound of him so i ended the call, when i asked why it took him a year almost to answer my reports he was evasive. its bothered us since, ben posted a message on facebook asking for witness even asking for the drivers who stopped to come forward but to no avail, we met last week & decided to post it on mufon for hope of a better response.my other mate sam hasn't really talked about it since, i think he puts it down to a having a long hot day & evening & just atmospherics playing up in the sky. lastly we was not drinking or taking anything, i was driving & he had 1 drink 3 hours before, we caught a movie & played some fottball, yes at night!
